comments.raw_text: This bug is for running our recorded sites as live sites through browsertime once a week (only fenix tests).
comments.text: This bug is for running our recorded sites as live sites through browsertime once a week (only fenix tests).
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com

comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.raw_text: This patch enables a new cron job that runs our recorded sites as live sites once a week through browsertime so we can continuously monitor how well our recordings match with what page the user is seeing.
comments.text:
Created attachment 9149422
Bug 1638376 - Run recorded sites as live sites once a week. r?#perftest


This patch enables a new cron job that runs our recorded sites as live sites once a week through browsertime so we can continuously monitor how well our recordings match with what page the user is seeing.
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com
